db:abstract.db:para: Represents one item in a box-and-whiskers chart.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: A box-and-whiskers item is a graphical representation of a range and three median values that is constructed from five different values. There are two ways to specify the values. The first one is by using a constructor or the append() method. The values have to be specified in the following order: lower extreme, lower quartile, median, upper quartile, and upper extreme.
The second way is to create an empty BoxSet instance and specify the values using the setValue() method.

db:section.db:title: brushFilename : string
db:section.db:para: The name of the file used as a brush for the box-and-whiskers item.

db:section.db:title: count : int
db:section.db:para: The number of values of the box-and-whiskers item.

db:section.db:title: label : string
db:section.db:para: The label of the category of the box-and-whiskers item.

db:section.db:title: values : list
db:section.db:para: The values of the box-and-whiskers item. The following enumerations can be used as indexes when accessing the list of values:

db:td.db:para: The smallest value of the box-and-whiskers item.
The median value of the lower half of the box-and-whiskers item.
The median value of the box-and-whiskers item.
The median value of the upper half of the box-and-whiskers item.
The largest value of the box-and-whiskers item.

db:section.db:title: cleared()
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when all the values of the box-and-whiskers item are set to 0.
The corresponding signal handler is onCleared().

db:section.db:title: clicked()
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the user clicks a box-and-whiskers item in the chart.
The corresponding signal handler is onClicked().

db:section.db:title: doubleClicked()
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the user double-clicks a box-and-whiskers item.
The corresponding signal handler is onDoubleClicked().

db:section.db:title: hovered(bool status)
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when a mouse is hovered over a box-and-whiskers item in a chart. When the mouse moves over the item, status turns true, and when the mouse moves away again, it turns false.
The corresponding signal handler is onHovered().

db:section.db:title: pressed()
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the user clicks a box-and-whiskers item in the chart and holds down the mouse button.
The corresponding signal handler is onPressed.

db:section.db:title: released()
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the user releases the mouse press on a box-and-whiskers item.
The corresponding signal handler is onReleased().

db:section.db:title: valueChanged(int index)
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the value of the box-and-whiskers item specified by index changes.
The corresponding signal handler is onValueChanged().

db:section.db:title: valuesChanged()
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when multiple values of the box-and-whiskers item change.
The corresponding signal handler is onValuesChanged().

db:section.db:title: void append(qreal value)
db:section.db:para: Appends the new value specified by value to the end of the box-and-whiskers item.

db:section.db:title: void at(int index)
db:section.db:para: Returns the value in the position specified by index.

db:section.db:title: void clear()
db:section.db:para: Sets all the values of the box-and-whiskers item to 0.

db:section.db:title: void setValue(int index, qreal value)
db:section.db:para: Sets the value specified by value in the position specified by index.
